Posts.Content: lucky8 wrote: I  have finished AC and am scheduled to start Taxol next week for 4 treatments. I'm estrogen positive, tumor (< 2 cm.) was removed with clear margins, spread to lymph nodes which were removed.  I am having my ovaries removed as precaution and to eliminate the need for hormone pills.  I am curious about the need for Taxol....if I skip it, and also radiation, how much will that affect my long-term prognosis??? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 4 rounds of AC and want to skip Taxol lucky8 Springtime
